nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS SPREADING INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF BELIZE AND THE YUCATAN PENINSULA...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINS SPREADING INLAND OVER PORTIONS OF BELIZE AND THE YUCATAN PENINSULA...
 As of 3:00 AM CST Sun Nov 17
 the center of Sara was located near 16.8, -87.8
 with movement WNW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
